Uses of Class
org.opengis.referencing.operation.TransformException

  • Packages that use TransformException 
    Package Description
    org.opengis.referencing.operation
    Coordinate operations (relationship between any two coordinate reference systems).

    • Uses of TransformException in org.opengis.referencing.operation

      Subclasses of TransformException in org.opengis.referencing.operation 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  NoninvertibleTransformException
      Thrown when MathTransform.inverse() is invoked but the transform can not be inverted.
